data.comment: The big names in today's match at Daegu Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Kim Hee-Gon, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Dejan Damjanovic puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Great play from Jeong Seung-won to set up the goal.
Daegu have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Busan to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Goal kick for Busan at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 18, Kim Hee-Gon signals a throw-in for Busan, close to Daegu's area.
Free kick in a good position for Busan!
Busan are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 24, Busan push forward at Daegu Stadium and Park Jong-woo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Daegu defence.
Corner awarded to Busan.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 25, Kim Hee-Gon awards Daegu a goal kick.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Daegu close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Busan have a dangerous throw-in.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
It's now 2-0 in Daegu as Cesinha scores for Daegu.
In the minute 30, Gu Sung-yun instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
In the minute 36, Kim Hee-Gon awards the away team a throw-in.
Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Daegu.
In the minute 42, Daegu drive upfield and Kim Dae-won gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Busan defender.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 43, Can Busan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Daegu's half?
At Daegu Stadium the fourth official shows that 7 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
In the minute 45, Daegu drives forward and Dejan Damjanovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In Daegu Daegu attack through Cesinha. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Busan have a goal kick.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a Busan throw-in in Daegu's half.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Busan.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Busan.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Daegu Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
The away team have replaced Kim Seung-jun with Kim Byong-oh. This is the first substitution made today by Duk-Jae Cho.
In the minute 47, Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Busan in Daegu.
In Daegu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 51, Kim Hee-Gon awards Daegu a goal kick.
Kwon Yong-hyun is on a sub for Lee Jung-hyub for Busan.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Ryu Jae-moon (Daegu) gets a yellow card.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Busan.
Daegu needs to be cautious. Busan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 56, Can Busan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Daegu have a dangerous throw-in.
Daegu's Dejan Damjanovic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Busan at Daegu Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Goal kick for Busan at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 61, Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Daegu just outside Busan's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Daegu close to the penalty box.
Park Jun-kang (Busan) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Cesinha (Daegu) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kim Seon-min gets his shot on target but fails to score for Daegu.
Daegu will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Busan.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Busan.
Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Park Jun-kang has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Ryu Jae-moon heads in to give Daegu a 3-0 lead at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Busan close to the penalty box.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
In the minute 73, Daegu needs to be cautious. Busan have an attacking throw-in.
Daegu have a goal kick.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
In the minute 75, Free kick Busan.
Kim Woo-seok is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Kim Hee-Gon awards Daegu a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Duk-Jae Cho (Busan) is making a third substitution, with Lee Sang-jun replacing Park Jong-woo.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 80, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Hee-Gon.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Daegu.
Busan to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
Lee Byeong-keun is making the team's first substitution at Daegu Stadium with Oh Hu-seong replacing Kim Seon-min.
Kim Byong-oh for Busan drives towards goal at Daegu Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hwang Tae-hyeon is replacing Ryu Jae-moon for the home team.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Daegu make their third substitution with Yoon Jong tae replacing Cesinha.
Throw-in Busan.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Daegu.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Free kick Daegu.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kim Hee-Gon signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Busan.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
That's full-time at Daegu Stadium. The final score is 3-0.
Romulo (Busan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Daegu's Kim Woo-seok has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
